text: Nuxis (Nùxis, Nùcis) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,566 people lived there. Its area is 61.59 km². It is 196 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Nuxis
